game.userInterface.RendererWindow

Class Renderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • game.userInterface.RendererWindow.Renderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Renderer
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    An extension of the JPanel object which can be used to display the game on.
    Author:
    Geoffrey Longuet (longuegeof)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Renderer

        public Renderer(GameMap.Tile[][] mapTiles,
                GameObject[][] mapObjects,
                Client client)
        Constructs a Renderer panel. This can be used as a regular swing component. Will draw a 2D array of tiles and objects in isometric space, with full support for rotations.
        Parameters:
        mapTiles - The 2D array of tiles to draw in isometric space.
        mapObjects - The 2D array of GameObjects to draw in isometric space.
        client - The client which the Renderer will use to communicate player updates to the server.

      • Renderer

        public Renderer(GameMap.Tile[][] mapTiles,
                GameObject[][] mapObjects,
                PlayerCharacter plyr)
        Parameters:
        mapTiles - The 2D array of tiles to draw in isometric space.
        mapObjects - The 2D array of GameObjects to draw in isometric space.
        plyr - The testing PlayerCharacter.

    • Method Detail

      • setChatBox

        public void setChatBox(ChatBox chatbox)
        Set the current chatBox which the Renderer will write object descriptions to.
        Parameters:
        chatbox - The ChatBox that the Renderer will use.

      • updateMap

        public void updateMap(GameMap.Tile[][] mapTiles,
                      GameObject[][] mapObjects)
        Updates the objects and tiles that will be displayed on the map. Expects perfectly square 2D arrays.
        Parameters:
        mapTiles - The tiles to display on the map.
        mapObjects - The objects to display on the map.

      • updateMap

        public void updateMap(GameObject[][] mapObjects)
        Updates the objects that will be displayed on the map. Expects a perfectly square 2D array.
        Parameters:
        mapObjects - The objects to display on the map.

      • updatePlayerCharacter

        public void updatePlayerCharacter(PlayerCharacter pc)
        Update the current player which is considered the main character for this Renderer.
        Parameters:
        pc - The character to use in place of the existing main character for this Renderer.

      • getTransMapObjects

        public GameObject[][] getTransMapObjects()
        Gets the current interpretation of the map objects which the Renderer is using.
        Returns:
        The array of GameObjects.

      • getTransMapTiles

        public GameMap.Tile[][] getTransMapTiles()
        Gets the current interpretation of the map tiles which the Renderer is using.
        Returns:
        The array of Map Tiles.
